title: Rebuild and redeploy to generate a new production link

requirements.text: Trigger a full rebuild and redeploy of the current application to production, and output the newly generated live production URL after deployment completes.
acceptanceCriteria: A fresh production deployment is executed from the current codebase (no code changes required).
After deployment completes, the system provides a single, copy-pastable live production URL for the new deployment.
The provided URL loads successfully and renders the app without runtime errors.

constraints: Use English for any user-facing text.
Do not modify any code unless required to complete the rebuild/redeploy.
